entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
